testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
After starting the program, you should request the coordinates of the Aircraft Carrier in that way: "Enter the coordinates of the Aircraft Carrier (5 cells):"
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test.
